text: Motiram Lahane (1922 - 11 March 2005) was a member of Rajya Sabha from Maharashtra state during the term 14 December 1978 to 2 April 1980 as Janata Party candidate. He had represented Murtizapur Assembly constituency of Maharashtra State for a term from 1995 to 1999. He was popularly known as Bhausaheb. He was a close associate of former Prime Minister Atal Bihari Vajpayee and former BJP president L K Advani. ==References== Category:Rajya Sabha members from Maharashtra Category:People from Akola district Category:1922 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Bharatiya Jana Sangh politicians Category:Maharashtra MLAs 1995–1999 Category:Marathi politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra Category:Janata Party politicians Category:Bharatiya Lok Dal politicians
title: Motiram Lahane
